english.segment1: I've got a wound that doesn't heal, Burning out again, Burning out again
english.segment2: I've not sure which of me is real, And I'm alone again, Burning out again
english.segment3: My hope runs underneath it all, The day that I'll be home
english.segment4: It won't be long, I belong, Somewhere past the setting sun
english.segment5: Find me free, find me strong, Somewhere back where I belong
english.segment6: Something shared with me again, But I'm not buying it, I'm not buying it
english.segment7: My wound goes deeper than the skin, There's no hiding it, So I'm not trying it
english.segment8: My hope runs underneath it all, The day that I'll be home,
english.segment9: It won't be long, I belong, Somewhere past the setting sun, Find me free, find me strong, Somewhere back where I belong
english.segment10: Yeah, Yeah, (Somewhere past the setting sun!)
english.segment11: Yeah, Yeah, (Going back where we belong!)
english.segment12: Yeah, Yeah, (I'll find you). (The setting sun!)
english.segment13: Let the weak say I am strong, and it won't be long, Let the right say I was wrong, and it won't be long. Let us find where we belong, Beyond the setting sun, Beyond the setting sun
english.segment14: It won't be long, I belong, Somewhere past the setting sun, Find me free, find me strong, Somewhere back where I belong
